title: What was Daisy intention as a pet?
body:
She lacks any resemblance of AI what so ever.  and she cant even hang around after Ivern dies. 

If you go full AP {{champion:427}}  to help Daisy stats, you just get focused and bursted, and Daisy leaves.
If you go tank. the AP ratios is so low Daisy receives not Buff and gets melted by the enemy

Tibbers at least has its burst on summon + stun + stays after {{champion:1}}  dies and goes full Berserk
Maiden works on synergy with {{champion:83}}  to increase his damage and Yorick on its own is a Tanky champ. so is not like you can just focus him.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
on unrelated note can we have that Ivern E when casted on himself Stuns the enemies rather than slow em??

replies.body:
The goal with Daisy's to offer a pet that's much more about CC than damage, in contrast with others like Tibbers, the Maiden, Spiderlings etc. She might need some number tweaking to fufill that role properly, we're still getting a read on how she and Ivern will perform once they've got a decent amount of play.

In terms of AI she definitely needs some improvements. We're working on that for the next patch, depending on how much work's needed might be some changes in a subsequent patch as well.

On related matter. if smite buff are removed. then will this means Ivern FotF costs might change too? Right now. getting Red Smite health back and Blue Smite mana back is a must requirement to be able to make a full camps clear without need to recall.

He might need some adjustments, we've been testing him quite a bit with the jungle changes though and looks pretty good overall. Smite giving some healing on all monsters does a lot to make up the health difference for one thing. Will need to keep an eye on mana for him though certainly.

Just don't buff him, please! I'm a support main and I love Ivern and I know that the reason so many people are bad at him is because of him being a support and them wanting to just kill everyone and being shocked when Ivern doesn't do that. You need to at the LEAST wait until the pros start playing around with him because I can guarantee that they're going to get him nerfed into the ground.
remember he is also intended as a Jungle and as such. he should at least be able to 1 vs 1 cause invasion of counter jungling. a little buff might be good. but nothing to make him a carry
He can fight 1v1, he's actually a lot more capable of defending himself than you realize.
he is good at keeping himself alive but pure 1 vs 1 is really an skill match up... where the enemy should make many mistakes. early game Ivern lacks both punch and beef. specially after using FotF

Can you also have your team work on her animations? Everything in the story and tool tips talk about her loving hugs, but her attack animation is just a bash, nothing resembling a hug. Maybe change it so she swings both fists inward in a hugging fashion, similar to Malphite's W attack animation.
Her aggro resets every 2 seconds and she walks all the way back to Ivern. It should be as simple as Alt+Clicking the desired target until they either die or you Alt+Click another target.

On the topic of AI's.
You may want to revisit Morde's, the thing became even clunkier and unresponsive :I

If the idea is to make her more about CC than a pure engage Damage like Tibber or Maiden. I understand it. I have had that 3 hits passive help to delay and enemy from escaping. 

IMO as Daisy is supposed to be a sentient being. she just leaving with Ivern dies still presents the problem that as good as Daisy CC might be. still not of much use when enemy champs can just Burst Ivern. and you have to stick close cause if you loose vision from Ivern. Daisy disengages. so more than buffing Daisy. just fixing her AI and making Ivers a little more resistant would be better.

I do enjoy playing Ivern with his passive tho, but having to build almost pure tank is the safest route that have worked for me so far
